examples.example: 这棵小树苗比旁边那棵高了一公分呢。

translate.english: This small sapling is one centimeter taller than the one next to it.

examples.example: 我的努力终于有了回报，这次考试成绩比上次进步了一公分。

translate.english: My efforts have finally paid off, and the test score has improved by one centimeter compared with the last time.

examples.example: 我的身高在这一年里长了一公分，真是让人开心呀。

translate.english: My height has increased by one centimeter in this year, which is really delightful.
